title: How quick will this ship?
body:
With presumably thousands of orders made on day one, what's the expected time to ship?  If I order on October 13th, will I be waiting a couple days, a couple weeks, or longer before the game ships out?

The merch store says that things ship within a day or two, I'm just wondering if that will still hold for this game.

replies.body: Assuming there are no problems with getting the shipment through customs and to our warehouse, they should ship as quickly as we can.  'Days' feels right, but I'd like to manage expectations a bit since this is our first time doing this - and if there's one thing I've learned through this process - things rarely go how you plan.

Hi there! You have been such a great help on these boards and on BGG, thanks for clearing up any questions that come up! I did hear somewhere that you are limiting it to one per household to help get it into more hands, is this true?
Crap, now I have to buy two houses. XD
